properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy, worthy is the Lamb,
Worthy, worthy is the Lamb,
Worthy, worthy is the Lamb,
That was slain.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Glory, hallelujah!
Praise Him, hallelujah!
Glory, hallelujah!
To the Lamb!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Savior, let Thy kingdom come!
Now the power of sin consume;
Bring Thy blest millennium,
Holy Lamb.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thus may we
each moment feel,
Love Him, serve Him,
praise Him still,
Till we all on Zionâ€™s hill
See the Lamb.
